layers.name: Angular
layers.description: Angular.js is powerful frontend framework for building dynamic web applications, offering modular components and two-way data binding for seamless user interactions.

layers.name: Express
layers.description: Express.js is a minimalist and flexible Node.js framework for creating robust web applications and APIs, known for its simplicity and speed in handling HTTP requests.

layers.name: Firebase
layers.description: Firebase is a comprehensive platform providing real-time database, authentication, hosting, and cloud functions for seamless app development and scalability

layers.name: Docker
layers.description: Docker is a containerization platform that simplifies application deployment by packaging software and its dependencies into containers, enabling efficient deployment across environments.
